thread.title_full: UIA Increases Flight Frequency Between Kiev and WarsawTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: UIA Increases Flight Frequency Between Kiev and WarsawTravelandtourworld.com
text:
UIA Increases Flight Frequency Between Kiev and Warsaw Published
Effective March 27, 2016, UIA will be operating additional non-stop scheduled flights between the capitals of Ukraine and Poland. The flights will be operated on modern Boeing 737-500 aircraft with two-class cabin configuration – Business Class and Economy Class.
Flight schedule :
Flight Destination
Days
Departure *
Arrival*
PS803
Kiev – Warsaw
12.45.7
20:00
20:30
PS804
Warsaw – Kiev
123.56.
05:50
08:20
*Local time
“UIA keeps on developing the model of a transit carrier from west to east and from north to south, – noted Evgeniya Satska, UIA Corporate Press Secretary. – Launching additional flights connecting Kiev and Warsaw, UIA will offer passengers from Poland convenient connecting services to Beijing, New York, as well as the cities across the UIA European flight network. Moreover, the UIA clients will benefit from more connections to Istanbul, Tbilisi, Athens, and Moscow”.
Round trip economy class ticket fares for Warsaw – Kiev non-stop flights start from 64.23 Euro (all taxes and surcharges included).
Source:- UIA
